page.title: 10Conygre Hall,Timsbury.
page.content: {Conygre Hall}in{Timsbury}was opened in 1973 by Major Cayser,a ship owner who lived in{Parish's House,Timsbury. The hall consists of the Grove room, the main hall,an office,a kitchen, toilets and showers and a snooker room.The stage has lights and there is a barber's chair.There are many clubs and activities such as snooker, badminton,dancing,keep-fit,natural history,over 60's,theatre,playgroup, welfare,whist,Women's Institute,Wine Circle,netball,football,cricket and dances.In the hall there is a glittering ball in the centre of the ceiling which can go round.The theatre group produces a very good pantomine every year that runs for four nights and is booked up every night.
